ch.unige.ng.statistics
Class DisruptiveCrossover<S,T extends GlobalIndividual<S>>

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.ops.crossover.DoubleOffspringCrossOver<T>
      ch.unige.ng.statistics.DisruptiveCrossover<S,T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Crossover<T>, Operator<T>, Statistic<int[],T>
public class DisruptiveCrossover<S,T extends GlobalIndividual<S>>
extends DoubleOffspringCrossOver<T>
implements Statistic<int[],T>

This class is used to see the statistics of a crosover. It creates a certain number of bins, and prints the histogram of the modifications. It calculates the fitness of the created individual and test it against the old ones.

Version:
4 juin 2005
Author:
Fontignie Jacques
